mapper.select: select 'M' as gender, count(*) cnt from (applicant join pickedcompany on applicant.id = pickedcompany.id) where cono = #{cono} and gender = 'M' union select 'F' as gender, count(*) cnt from (applicant join pickedcompany on applicant.id = pickedcompany.id) where cono = #{cono} and gender = 'F'
